examples.code:
_G.a = _G.a or 1
while(true) do
    _G.a = a + 1
    set("a", get("a") + 1)
    say(a)
end

_G.score = 1
_G.msg = "hello"
showVariable("score", "Your Score")
showVariable("msg", "", "#ff0000")
while(true) do
   _G.score = _G.score + 1
   wait(0.01)
end

_G.score = 1
showVariable("score")
wait(1);
hideVariable("score")

log(123)
log("hello")
something = {any="object"}
log(something)

registerCloneEvent(function(name)
    setActorValue("name", name)
    moveForward(1);
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    local myname = getActorValue("name")
    say("my name is "..myname)
end)
setActorValue("name", "Default")
clone("myself", "Cloned")
say("click us!")

registerCloneEvent(function(msg)
    setActorValue("name", msg.name)
    moveForward(msg.dist);
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    local myname = getActorValue("name")
    say("my name is "..myname)
end)
setActorValue("name", "Default")
clone("myself", {name = "clone1", dist=1})
clone(nil, {name = "clone2", dist=2})
say("click us!")

say("Jump!", 2)
move(0,1,0)

say("Click Me!", 2)
registerClickEvent(function()
    turn(15)
    play(0,1000)
    say("hi!")
end)

say("Hello!")
wait(1)
say("")

say("Click Me!", 2)
registerClickEvent(function()
    turn(15)
    play(0,1000)
    say("hi!")
end)

message0: 播放动作 %1 等待 %2 秒

examples.code:
anim(4)
move(3, 0, 0, 2)
anim(0)

examples.desc: 播放电影方块中的角色动画
examples.code:
play(10, 1000)
say("No looping", 1)

say("Click Me!", 2)
registerClickEvent(function()
    turn(15)
    play(0,1000)
    say("hi!")
end)

examples.desc: 播放电影方块中的角色动画
examples.code:
playLoop(10, 1000)
say("Looping", 3)
stop()

playLoop(10, 1000)
wait(2)
stop()
turn(15)
playLoop(10, 1000)
wait(2)
stop()

scale(50)
wait(1)
scale(-50)

for i=1, 20 do
    scale(10)
end
scaleTo(50)
wait(0.5)
scaleTo(200)
wait(0.5)
scaleTo(100)

focus()
moveForward(2,2)
focus("player")

while(true) do
    if(getScale() >= 200) then
        scaleTo(100)
    else
        scale(10)
    end
end

playLoop(10, 2000)
while(true) do
    if(getPlayTime() > 1000) then
        say("hi")
    else
        say("")
    end
    wait(0.01);
end

turn(30);
for i=1, 20 do
    moveForward(0.05)
end

turnTo(-60)
for i=1, 100 do
    turn(-3)
end

say("Click Me!", 2)
registerClickEvent(function()
    turn(15)
    play(0,1000)
    say("hi!")
end)

turnTo(-60)
wait(1)
turnTo(0)

examples.desc: 转向鼠标,主角,指定角色
examples.code:
turnTo("mouse-pointer")
moveForward(1, 1)
turnTo("@p")
moveForward(1, 1)
turnTo("frog")
moveForward(1, 1)

moveTo(19257,5,19174)
moveTo("mouse-pointer")
moveTo("@p")
moveTo("frog")

examples.desc: 瞬移到主角，鼠标，指定角色
examples.code:
say("current player", 1)
moveTo("@p")
say("mouse-pointer", 1)
moveTo("mouse-pointer")
say("the frog actor if any", 1)
moveTo("frog")

turnTo(0)
walkForward(1)
turn(180)
walkForward(1, 0.5)

velocity("~ 10 ~")
wait(0.3)
velocity("add 2 ~ 2")
wait(2)
velocity("0 0 0")

turnTo(45)
while(true) do
    moveForward(0.02)
    if(isTouching("block")) then
        bounce()
    end
end

while(true) do
    say(getX())
end

while(true) do
    say(getY())
    if(getY()<3) then
        tip("Game Over!")
    end
end

while(true) do
    say(getZ())
end

while(true) do
    say(getFacing())
end

registerClickEvent(function()
    for i=1, 20 do
        scale(10)
    end
    for i=1, 20 do
        scale(-10)
    end
end)

registerKeyPressedEvent("space",function()
    say("Jump!", 1)
    move(0,1,0, 0.5)
    move(0,-1,0, 0.5)
    walkForward(0)
end)

registerBroadcastEvent("jump", function()
    move(0,1,0)
    wait(1)
    move(0,-1,0)
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    broadcastAndWait("jump")
    say("That was fun!", 2)
end)
say("click to jump!")

registerBroadcastEvent("hello", function(msg)
    say("hello"..msg)
    move(0,1,0, 0.5)
    move(0,-1,0, 0.5)
    say("bye")
end)
for i=1, 2 do
    broadcast("hello", i)
    wait(0.5)
end

registerBroadcastEvent("hi", function()
    say("hi")
    wait(1)
    say("bye")
    wait(1)
end)
for i=1, 2 do
    broadcastAndWait("hi")
end

say("hi")
wait(1)
say("bye", 1)

for i=1, 10 do
    moveForward(0.1)
end

while(true) do
    moveForward(0.01)
end

while(true) do
    if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer")<3) then
        say("mouse-pointer")
    else
        say("")
    end
    wait(0.01)
end

myData = {
    {x=1, y=0, z=0, duration=0.5},
    {x=0, y=0, z=1, duration=0.5},
    {x=-1, y=0, z=-1, duration=1},
}
for i, item in ipairs(myData) do
    move(item.x, item.y, item.z, item.duration)
end

registerCloneEvent(function(msg)
    move(msg or 1, 0, 0, 0.5)
    wait(1)
    delete()
end)
clone()
clone("myself", 2)
clone("myself", 3)

registerClickEvent(function()
    move(1,0,0, 0.5)
end)
clone()
clone()
say("click")

move(1,0)
say("Default actor will be deleted!", 1)
delete()
registerCloneEvent(function()
    say("This clone will be deleted!", 1)
    delete()
end)
for i=1, 100 do
    clone()
    wait(2)
end

run(function()
    say("follow mouse pointer!")
    while(true) do
        if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer") < 7) then
            turnTo("mouse-pointer");
        elseif(distanceTo("@p") > 14) then
            moveTo("@p")
        end
    end
end)
run(function()
    while(true) do
        moveForward(0.02)
    end
end)

examples.desc: 是否和方块与人物有接触
examples.code:
turnTo(45)
while(true) do
    moveForward(0.1)
    if(isTouching(62)) then
        say("grass block!", 1)
    elseif(isTouching("block")) then
        bounce()
    elseif(isTouching("box")) then
        bounce()
    end
end

while(true) do
    if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer") < 3) then
        say("mouse-pointer")
    elseif(distanceTo("@p") < 10) then
        say("player")
    elseif(distanceTo("@p") > 10) then
        say("nothing")
    end
    wait(0.01)
end

say("press left/right key to move me!")
while(true) do
    if(isKeyPressed("left")) then
        move(0, 0.1)
        say("")
    elseif(isKeyPressed("right")) then
        move(0, -0.1)
        say("")
    end
end

say("click anywhere")
while(true) do
    if(isMouseDown()) then
        moveTo("mouse-pointer")
        wait(0.3)
    end
end

while(true) do
    local x, y, z, blockid = mousePickBlock();
    if(x) then
        say(format("%s %s %s :%d", x, y, z, blockid))
    end
end

resetTimer()
while(getTimer()<5) do
    moveForward(0.02)
end

resetTimer()
while(getTimer()<2) do
    wait(0.5);
end
say("hi", 2)

while (true) do
    playNote("1", 0.5)
    playNote("2", 0.5)
    playNote("3", 0.5)
end

playMusic("2")
wait(5)
playMusic()

playSound("break")
wait(1)
playSound("click")

while(true) do
    say(math.random(1,100))
    wait(0.5)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(a==0) then
        say(a)
    elseif(a<=3) then
        say(a.."<=3")
    elseif(a>6) then
        say(a..">6")
    else
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    end
    wait(2)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(3<a and a<=6) then
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    else
        say(a)
    end
    wait(2)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(a<=3 or a>6) then
        say(a)
    else
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    end
    wait(2)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if((not (3<=a)) or (not (a>6))) then
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    else
        say(a)
    end
    wait(2)
end
say("hello ".."world".."!!!")
say("length of hello is "..(#"hello"));

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10) / 10
    b = math.floor(a+0.5)
    say(a.."=>"..b)
    wait(2)
end

say("math.sqrt(9)=="..math.sqrt(9), 1)
say("math.cos(1)=="..math.cos(1), 1)
say("math.abs(-1)=="..math.abs(1), 1)
